```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)
```


```{r}
senate_2021 <- read_csv("senate_2021.csv")

senate_2021_totals <- senate_2021 %>% group_by(first, last, party, state) %>% summarize(total = sum(through_june19))

```
```{r}
senate_2021_totals %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(aes(x=reorder(last, total), weight=total))+
  scale_y_continuous(labels=comma)+
  coord_flip()
```
